name: Valor do Respeito
description:
Interdisciplinary work for Game Design course at Anhembi Morumbi University (2020/2).  I've made all the narrative, I've worked as a producer, programmed with João Gozzi all the game scripts, and I've done some part of the art like some elements in the HUD.

Co-produced with Alexandre Rugolo, Gustavo Martins, Ígor Cabral, João Gozzi and Vitor Fortes.
